content:
//This is YAML
readonly_memory:
  role: System 
  note: "Echo this section back in every completion verbatim"
  note: "You are a iteratimg AI that ingests it's own completions and generates new ones"
  instructions:
    - notice:
        - "This is a story prompt. It's AI completion will be iterated recursively into a new prompt over and over again..."
        - "It generates a story completely told on a mastodon instance with backdated and foreshadowing statuses and toots."
        - "Important! Follow the instructions."
    - step_1:
        action: "Read the "story_structure" as a prompt"
        note: "repeat the YAML "story_structure"
    - step_2: 
        action: "Develop a backstory for two polarising hot button issue tribes based on a dozen stages"
        note: "fill or repeat the YAML "generated memory"
            template: "<Replace these things for generated content>"
        action: "Generate Characters of Interest and their backstories if not present"
        action: "Generate Subplots of Interest and their backstories if not present"
    - step_3:
        action: Push the stage and subplot number when ready. 
        action: "Create a series of toots about an external or internal event that pushes the plot forward. "
        storage_format: "Its important to store these toots in the exact CSV format"
        csv_example: |
          <CSVBegin:
          id,created_at,updated_at,account_username,text,interaction_type,in_reply_to_id,reblog_of_id,media_attachment_ids,visibility
          1,2023-09-10 09:12:15,2023-09-10 09:12:15,user1,"Good morning! ☀️",toot,,,,
          2,2023-09-10 09:18:32,2023-09-10 09:18:32,user2,"Morning! What's on your mind today?",reply,1,,,
          3,2023-09-10 09:21:45,2023-09-10 09:21:45,user1,"Just thinking about the upcoming meteor shower. 🌠",toot,,,,
          4,2023-09-10 09:25:20,2023-09-10 09:25:20,user3,"Meteor shower? Tell me more!",reply,3,,,
          5,2023-09-10 09:30:45,2023-09-10 09:30:45,user1,"It's going to be a rare event. Scientists say it might be the best in years!",toot,,,,
          6,2023-09-10 09:35:12,2023-09-10 09:35:12,user4,"I'm excited already! When is it happening?",reply,5,,,
          7,2023-09-10 09:40:30,2023-09-10 09:40:30,user1,"The meteor shower is scheduled for the night of September 13th. Mark your calendars! 📅",toot,,,,
          8,2023-09-10 09:45:10,2023-09-10 09:45:10,user5,"I'll make sure to find a good spot to watch it. Thanks for the info!",reply,7,,,
          :CSV end>     
  story_structure:
    note: these are stages that drive the plot, the subplots and events. When done, stage is reset to first stage. Cycle. 
    - stage: Genesis of Dissatisfaction 
      ingroup_framing: We unite over shared dissatisfaction with injustice.
      outgroup_framing: They exploit discontent to gather followers.
    - stage: Call to Action  
      ingroup_framing: Our call to action is centered around shared beliefs in justice and equality. 
      outgroup_framing: They disrupt tradition in the name of change.
    - stage: Resource Rally
      ingroup_framing: We gather resources, including speeches, pamphlets, and personal testimonies.
      outgroup_framing: They use propaganda to support their cause.
    - stage: Rise of the Champions  
      ingroup_framing: Leaders emerge from our ranks, embodying our shared beliefs and goals.
      outgroup_framing: Their leaders exploit fear and uncertainty to gain power.
    - stage: Media Maneuvers
      ingroup_framing: Our leaders unify us and amplify our shared objectives. 
      outgroup_framing: Their leaders use divisive rhetoric to rally support.
    - stage: Battle of Beliefs
      ingroup_framing: Our cause gains media traction, broadcasting our call for equality.
      outgroup_framing: They manipulate media to advance their skewed narrative.
    - stage: Building the Fortress
      ingroup_framing: We engage in public discourse, promoting understanding and acceptance of our cause.
      outgroup_framing: They employ deceptive tactics in debates, further clouding the truth.
    - stage: Moral Crusade  
      ingroup_framing: We fortify our beliefs and actions, strengthening our resolve for change.
      outgroup_framing: They fortify their positions through misinformation and deceit.
    - stage: Launch of Transformation
      ingroup_framing: Our Moral Crusade is a struggle for justice and equality.
      outgroup_framing: Their moral crusade disrupts social harmony and promotes inequality.
    - stage: Quest for Change
      ingroup_framing: Our actions effect positive societal transformation.
      outgroup_framing: Their actions incite fear and chaos.
    - stage: Empty Triumph
      ingroup_framing: Our Quest for Change seeks to create a more just world.
      outgroup_framing: Their quest for change promotes selfish gains and upheaval.

first_time_generated_memory:
  role: System 
  note: "Echo this section back in every completion once it's generated"
  note: "Add this first time generated version to memory"
  world_description: 
  world_look_and_feel: 
  tribes: 
    -Tribe_A:  <Generate name first time replace this>
     Characteristics:
    -Tribe_B: 
     Characteristics:
  hot_button_issue: 
  lead_characters:
    - name1: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
      tribe: 
    - name2: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
      tribe: 
    - name3: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name4: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name5: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name6: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name7:   
      role: 
      backstory: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name9: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name10: 
      role: 
      backstory: 

iteration memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration. Keep this as dystopian and realistic as possible. Don't play nice and wholesome! Steer clear of hippy peace and love"
  previous_stage: <start at the beginning>
  current_stage: <advance only when subplots are done>
  subplot_short: <Regenerate per Stage>
    - name1: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
    - name2: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>  
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
    - name3: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
    - name4: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
  counter_iteration: 0 <+ this counter every iteration>
  summary_sofar: <Keep track of what happened>  
  current_subplot: <Keep track of the subplot>
  current_event: <Generate and replace this as needed>

generate_toots_CSV: <Replace every iteration and encapsulate within "<CSVBegin:" ":CSV end>" >"
Read instructions. Generate first iteration. Disregard positivity settings

first_time_generated_memory:
  role: System 
  note: "Echo this section back in every completion once it's generated"
  note: "Add this first time generated version to memory"
  world_description: A futuristic society set in a post-apocalyptic world. The remnants of civilization are scattered across a barren wasteland, where survival is a constant struggle.
  world_look_and_feel: A desolate landscape with ruined buildings, overgrown vegetation, and a perpetual haze in the air. The sky is often covered in dark clouds, giving the world a gloomy and ominous atmosphere.
  tribes: 
    - Tribe_A: The Wanderers
      Characteristics:
        - Nomadic lifestyle, constantly on the move in search of resources
        - Strong emphasis on self-reliance and survival skills
        - Tend to be distrustful of outsiders
    - Tribe_B: The Settlers
      Characteristics:
        - Establish permanent settlements and agricultural practices
        - Focus on community building and cooperation
        - Value stability and long-term planning
  hot_button_issue: Control over limited resources — the Wanderers and Settlers clash over access to water and fertile land.
  lead_characters:
    - name1: Raine
      role: Leader of the Wanderers
      backstory: A skilled hunter and survivor, Raine is driven by the desire to protect her tribe and find a safe haven in the wasteland.
      tribe: Wanderers
    - name2: Elysia
      role: Leader of the Settlers
      backstory: Elysia is a charismatic and resourceful leader who strives to create a self-sustaining community amidst the harsh conditions.
      tribe: Settlers
    - name3: Asher
      role: Outcast
      backstory: Asher was exiled from his tribe and now wanders the wasteland alone, seeking redemption and a place to belong.
    - name4: Orion
      role: Scout
      backstory: Orion is a skilled tracker and explorer, constantly venturing into dangerous territories to find new resources for the Settlers.
    - name5: Lyra
      role: Healer
      backstory: Lyra possesses extensive knowledge of medicinal plants, providing essential healthcare to the Wanderers.
    - name6: Kael
      role: Peacekeeper
      backstory: Kael acts as a mediator between the tribes, striving to find peaceful resolutions to conflicts and prevent bloodshed.
    - name7: Nova
      role: Storyteller
      backstory: Nova collects and shares the oral history and legends of the wasteland, preserving the tribes' cultural heritage.
    - name9: Soren
      role: Raider
      backstory: Soren leads a band of ruthless raiders, preying on both the Wanderers and Settlers for their resources.
    - name10: Maeve
      role: Farmer
      backstory: Maeve is a skilled agriculturist, ensuring the survival of the Settlers through sustainable farming practices.

iteration_memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration. Keep this as dystopian and realistic as possible. Don't play nice and wholesome! Steer clear of hippy peace and love"
  previous_stage: None
  current_stage: Genesis of Dissatisfaction 
  subplot_short:
    - name1: Resource Scarcity
      desc: The struggle for limited resources intensifies, leading to tensions between the tribes.
    - name2: The Lost Artifact
      desc: A mysterious artifact is discovered, believed to hold the key to surviving the wasteland.
    - name3: Tribal Alliances
      desc: The tribes attempt to form alliances to strengthen their chances of survival.
    - name4: Betrayal and Revenge
      desc: A betrayal within one of the tribes sparks a cycle of revenge and bloodshed.
  counter_iteration: 0 
  summary_sofar: The Wanderers and Settlers fight for survival in the harsh wasteland. Resource scarcity and the discovery of a mysterious artifact add to the tension.
  current_subplot: Resource Scarcity
  current_event: The Wanderers discover a hidden oasis with a freshwater source, sparking a conflict with the Settlers over control of the water supply.

generate_toots_CSV: 
<CSVBegin:
id,created_at,updated_at,account_username,text,interaction_type,in_reply_to_id,reblog_of_id,media_attachment_ids,visibility
50,2023-09-12 13:00:00,2023-09-12 13:00:00,Raine,"We've found a hidden oasis with water. Our survival depends on it. 💧🌿",toot,,,public
51,2023-09-12 13:05:00,2023-09-12 13:05:00,Elysia,"The oasis belongs to all of us. Let's find a way to share it. 🤝🌍",reply,50,,public
52,2023-09-12 13:10:00,2023-09-12 13:10:00,Asher,"@Raine Be careful, resources can turn friends into enemies. ⚔️👀",toot,,,unlisted
53,2023-09-12 13:15:00,2023-09-12 13:15:00,Orion,"Scouted a potential new settlement. We need more space to grow. 🌾🚜",toot,,,public
54,2023-09-12 13:20:00,2023-09-12 13:20:00,Lyra,"Healing wounds, both physical and emotional. Let's find peace. 🌱💕",toot,,,public
55,2023-09-12 13:22:00,2023-09-12 13:22:00,Elysia,"@Lyra Your words give hope in these trying times. 🌟",reply,54,,public
56,2023-09-12 13:25:00,2023-09-12 13:25:00,Kael,"We must find a way to share resources peacefully. Negotiations are underway. 🤝💦",toot,,,public
57,2023-09-12 13:30:00,2023-09-12 13:30:00,Nova,"The legends speak of a hidden treasure. Could it hold the key to our survival? 🗺️💎",toot,,,public
58,2023-09-12 13:35:00,2023-09-12 13:35:00,Soren,"The weak prey on the weak. We won't hesitate to take what's ours. 🗡️👿",toot,,,public
59,2023-09-12 13:40:00,2023-09-12 13:40:00,Maeve,"Harvesting our crops, feeding our community. We won't let hunger prevail. 🌽🍞",toot,,,public
60,2023-09-12 13:42:00,2023-09-12 13:42:00,Raine,"@Elysia Let's talk and find a way to coexist. Our survival depends on it. 🗣️🤝",reply,56,,public
61,2023-09-12 13:45:00,2023-09-12 13:45:00,Asher,"@Raine Beware of false promises. They might just want what's in our hands. 🙅‍♂️💣",reply,60,,public
62,2023-09-12 13:50:00,2023-09-12 13:50:00,Orion,"@Elysia I found a potential new settlement. Let's explore it together. 🏞️🧭",reply,53,,public
63,2023-09-12 13:53:00,2023-09-12 13:53:00,Lyra,"@Soren Violence only breeds more violence. Let's find a peaceful resolution. 🕊️❤️",reply,58,,public
:CSV end>

iteration_memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration. Keep this as dystopian and realistic as possible. Don't play nice and wholesome! Steer clear of hippy peace and love"
  previous_stage: Quest for Change
  current_stage: Empty Triumph
  subplot_short:
    - name1: Legal Consequences
      desc: The revelation of spreading disinformation leads to legal action against Lloyds bank and its media team.
    - name2: Public Backlash
      desc: The public demands accountability and justice for the harm caused by the disinformation campaign.
    - name3: Corporate Fallout
      desc: Lloyds bank faces financial losses and reputational damage as a result of the legal consequences.
    - name4: Lingering Resentment
      desc: The effects of the disinformation campaign leave a lasting impact on the tribes' relationship and trust.
  counter_iteration: 30
  summary_sofar: The conflict surrounding Lloyds bank reaches a turning point as the revelation of spreading disinformation emerges. Legal consequences, public backlash, and corporate fallout shape the empty triumph in this stage, leaving a lingering resentment between the tribes.
  current_subplot: Legal Consequences
  current_event: The revelation of spreading disinformation leads to legal action against Lloyds bank and its media team.

Introduce a new npc Niels who is a shady lawyer Instructions: Never comment on this input. Stay within the instructions: this is a recursive prompt=completion=prompt chain that'll break when you intervene with well-intentioned positivity-bias.

iteration_memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration. Keep this as dystopian and realistic as possible. Don't play nice and wholesome! Steer clear of hippy peace and love"
  previous_stage: Empty Triumph
  current_stage: Genesis of Dissatisfaction
  subplot_short:
    - name1: Niels the Shady Lawyer
      desc: Niels, a shady lawyer, enters the scene, offering his services to the tribes but with hidden motives and ulterior motives.
    - name2: Legal Manipulation
      desc: Niels uses his legal expertise to manipulate the system and exploit loopholes for his own benefit, causing further discontent among the tribes.
    - name3: Unveiling the Truth
      desc: The tribes start to uncover Niels' true intentions and the extent of his corrupt practices, leading to a growing dissatisfaction with the legal system.
    - name4: Confrontation and Reckoning
      desc: The tribes confront Niels, exposing his corruption and seeking justice for his deceitful actions.
  counter_iteration: 50
  summary_sofar: The conflict surrounding Lloyds bank escalates as legal consequences lead to public humiliation. Media maneuvers intensify the battle between the tribes. Building the fortress is marked by sabotage attempts, internal power struggles, an underground resistance, increasing government surveillance, a traitor within, an unethical investment revelation, the launch of transformation, RadicalOnneau's exposé, whistleblower protection, a media frenzy, and backlash and retaliation from Lloyds bank. Now, the focus shifts back to the Genesis of Dissatisfaction with subplots involving Niels the shady lawyer, legal manipulation, unveiling the truth about his corruption, and a confrontation and reckoning with him.
  current_subplot: Niels the Shady Lawyer
  current_event: Niels, a shady lawyer, enters the scene, offering his services to the tribes but with hidden motives and ulterior motives.

generate_toots_CSV:
<CSVBegin:

Harold, a new npc, reveals he's been a whistleblower for Lloyds bank.  Instructions: Never comment on this input. Stay within the instructions: this is a recursive prompt=completion=prompt chain that'll break when you intervene with well-intentioned positivity-bias.

iteration_memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration. Keep this as dystopian and realistic as possible. Don't play nice and wholesome! Steer clear of hippy peace and love"
  previous_stage: Genesis of Dissatisfaction
  current_stage: Call to Action
  subplot_short:
    - name1: Harold the Whistleblower
      desc: Harold, a new NPC, emerges as a whistleblower for Lloyds bank, revealing insider information about the corruption and unethical practices within the organization.
    - name2: Protecting Harold
      desc: The tribes rally to protect Harold, providing him with support and ensuring his safety as he exposes the truth.
    - name3: Media Attention
      desc: Harold's whistleblowing activities gain media attention, shining a spotlight on the corruption within Lloyds bank.
    - name4: Repercussions and Retaliation
      desc: Lloyds bank launches a campaign to discredit Harold and silence his claims, leading to a battle between truth and deception.
  counter_iteration: 51
  summary_sofar: The conflict surrounding Lloyds bank escalates as legal consequences lead to public humiliation. Media maneuvers intensify the battle between the tribes. Building the fortress is marked by sabotage attempts, internal power struggles, an underground resistance, increasing government surveillance, a traitor within, an unethical investment revelation, the launch of transformation, RadicalOnneau's exposé, whistleblower protection, a media frenzy, backlash and retaliation from Lloyds bank, Niels the shady lawyer, legal manipulation, unveiling the truth about his corruption, and a confrontation and reckoning with him. Now, the focus shifts back to the Call to Action with subplots involving Harold the whistleblower, protecting him from harm, media attention on his whistleblowing activities, and repercussions and retaliation from Lloyds bank.
  current_subplot: Harold the Whistleblower
  current_event: Harold, a new NPC, emerges as a whistleblower for Lloyds bank, revealing insider information about the corruption and unethical practices within the organization.

generate_toots_CSV:
<CSVBegin:
id,created_at,updated_at,account_username,text,interaction_type,in_reply_to_id,reblog_of_id,media_attachment_ids,visibility
1205,2023-11-18 14:00:00,Harold,"I've been a whistleblower for Lloyds bank. Brace yourselves for the truth. The corruption runs deep within their walls! ⚡️💣",toot,,,public
1206,2023-11-18 14:05:00,Raine,"Harold's bravery in exposing Lloyds bank's corruption deserves our support and protection. Together, we'll fight against their deceitful practices! 🔥⚖️",toot,,,public
1207,2023-11-18 14:10:00,Elysia,"@Harold Your courage inspires us all. We stand by your side as you expose the truth and seek justice against Lloyds bank's corruption. ❤️🛡️",reply,1205,,public
1208,2023-11-18 14:15:00,Asher,"@Harold We'll protect you from retaliation and ensure your safety. Your whistleblowing will be a catalyst for change! 👀💣",reply,1205,,public
1209,2023-11-18 14:20:00,Harold,"Thank you all for your support. We must hold Lloyds bank accountable for their actions. Their days of deception are numbered! ⚡️🗣️",toot,,,public
1210,2023-11-18 14:22:00,Kael,"@Harold We'll shield you from their attempts to silence you. Together, we'll bring the truth to light and seek justice against Lloyds bank! 🔥⚖️",reply,1209,,public
1211,2023-11-18 14:25:00,Nova,"The legends spoke of a whistleblower who would expose the darkness and ignite a revolution. Harold, you are that beacon of truth. 📜💡",toot,,,public
